description: Function is called but not defined; may occur due to missing import, wrong binding, or incorrect scope.
Attempting to access a property or method of a null or None object. Often indicates uninitialized variable or failed API response.

meta.occurrence_pattern: runtime access after assignment or fetch

pattern: (Connection refused|Database connection failed|Could not connect to server)
description: Database is unreachable or credentials are invalid; may result in failed transactions or app crash.
API request limit exceeded; implement retry/backoff logic or check API quota.
Promise rejection not caught. Could lead to silent failures in async code.

pattern: (heap out of memory|MemoryError|GC overhead limit exceeded)
description: Memory usage exceeds limits or garbage collection cannot reclaim memory; may cause process crash.
Code contains invalid syntax; compiler/interpreter cannot parse code.
Code uses deprecated API; should migrate to supported API to avoid future breakage.
Operation exceeds maximum wait time; could be network or service related.

meta.occurrence_pattern: async calls, network requests, DB queries

description: Failed SSL/TLS handshake; may indicate expired, self-signed, or invalid certificate.

pattern: (Access to fetch at .* from origin .* has been blocked by CORS policy)
description: Cross-Origin Resource Sharing blocked the request; adjust server headers or use proxy.
Variable type incompatible with operation; often due to implicit casting or wrong API usage.

meta.occurrence_pattern: compile or runtime, depending on language

pattern: (IndexError: list index out of range|ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException|slice index out of range)
description: Accessing collection index outside its bounds; may indicate logic error or off-by-one bug.

pattern: (Maximum call stack size exceeded|RecursionError: maximum recursion depth exceeded)
description: Detected infinite loop due to circular imports or recursion. Could crash app if unchecked.

meta.occurrence_pattern: runtime during module load or recursive calls

description: Invalid JSON payload; usually malformed or unexpected content from API, file, or user input.

common_causes: API returned HTML or text instead of JSON

description: Async operation exceeded its timeout limit; may indicate network slowness, deadlock, or blocked thread.
Failed authentication; user or service credentials incorrect. Could block critical workflow.

meta.occurrence_pattern: runtime during login or API call

description: Required file or resource not found; may break program if not handled gracefully.
Operation denied due to insufficient permissions; can happen on filesystem, DB, network, or API.

pattern: (Unreachable code detected|code after return statement|dead code warning)
description: Code block will never execute; may indicate logic error or outdated code.
Function or API is deprecated; upgrade to avoid future breakage.
Attempt to access dictionary or object key that does not exist; often logic bug.

pattern: (Content Security Policy violation|Refused to load the script|unsafe-inline)
description: CSP blocked a resource or script; adjust policy headers or move inline scripts.

pattern: (Converting circular structure to JSON|RecursionError: circular reference)
description: JSON serialization fails due to circular references in object; may require custom serializer.
Network connectivity issue detected; server or host cannot be reached.
Regex compilation failed; pattern syntax invalid.
Detected deadlock in multithreading/multiprocessing or async routines; process hangs.
Required module/package/library not found; check install or path.
Infinite recursion or excessively deep call chain; process crashes if unhandled.
TLS/SSL handshake failed; may indicate invalid certificate, protocol mismatch, or MITM attempt.
Server encountered unexpected condition; may require investigation in backend/service.
Client forbidden from accessing resource; may need permissions review or API key check.
Requested resource not found; often caused by wrong URL/path or deleted resource.
Database query exceeded allowed time; may indicate performance issue or deadlock.
Database integrity constraint violated; check data consistency or migration issues.
Generic unhandled exception; may crash app or leave inconsistent state.
Code depends on deprecated library; consider upgrade or replacement.
Failed to parse YAML content; usually malformed, wrong indentation, or unsupported type.
TLS/SSL certificate expired; update certificate or adjust system trust store.
API returned invalid or unexpected data; may break parsing logic.
Potential cross-site scripting vulnerability detected; user input improperly sanitized.

pattern: (SQL syntax error|database error|SQL injection attempt detected)
description: Potential SQL injection attempt; validate input and use parameterized queries.
Operation on an object that has already been disposed or garbage collected.
Operation is invalid for the object type; check method or operand compatibility.

meta.occurrence_pattern: runtime during method invocation or operator usage

description: Attempt to divide a number by zero; may crash process or yield infinity.
Data does not conform to expected JSON schema; may break processing pipelines.
Detected circular import between modules; may cause partial import or runtime error.
Resource (file, socket, DB connection) not properly closed; may cause leaks or lock issues.
Data cannot be encoded/decoded; often occurs with mismatched charsets.

pattern: (Maximum call stack size exceeded|circular promise chain)
description: Promises reference each other creating infinite async loop; causes stack overflow.
Long synchronous operation blocking async loop; may freeze app or delay tasks.
Detected invalid memory access or corruption; may cause crash or undefined behavior.
Installed dependency version does not match required version; may break runtime behavior.

pattern: (Converting circular structure to JSON|circular reference detected)
description: Object contains circular references preventing serialization; requires custom handling.

pattern: (Too many open files|EMFILE|file descriptor limit exceeded)
description: Process exceeded OS file descriptor limit; may crash or fail I/O operations.

pattern: (Race condition detected|inconsistent state due to concurrency|data corruption)
description: Concurrent access to shared resource leads to unexpected behavior or data corruption.
Using language syntax deprecated in current version; may break in future updates.

pattern: (Refused to execute inline script|Content Security Policy)
description: Inline script blocked by CSP; move scripts to external files or adjust CSP headers.
HTTP request redirected repeatedly; may indicate misconfigured routing or infinite redirect chain.
DNS resolution for hostname failed; may indicate network or configuration issue.
API parameter used is deprecated; update calls to supported parameters.
Detected buffer overflow; may lead to crash, memory corruption, or security vulnerability.
Required library/dependency missing during runtime; may crash app.

pattern: (Circular dependency detected|Maximum call stack size exceeded)
description: Circular dependency detected at runtime; may cause unexpected behavior or crash.

common_causes: module A imports B imports A

description: Request rejected because CSRF token not present or invalid; security risk if ignored.

common_causes: forgot to include token in form/header

description: Client exceeded API rate limit; consider backoff or retry strategy.
Failed to connect via proxy; network route blocked or proxy misconfigured.
TLS/SSL certificate revoked by CA; must update certificate immediately.
Remote server closed connection unexpectedly; may indicate network issue or server crash.

pattern: (Deadlock found when trying to get lock|database deadlock detected)
description: Database deadlock detected during transaction; may require retry logic or lock reordering.
Async coroutine created but never awaited; may lead to incomplete execution or resource leaks.
SSL/TLS protocol mismatch between client and server; connection fails.
Deadlock detected between threads/processes; shared resources cannot proceed.
Object serialization failed; may involve unsupported type or circular reference.
I/O operation exceeded allowed time; may indicate network slowness, DB lag, or file lock.

pattern: (415 Unsupported Media Type|content type not supported)
description: HTTP request content-type not supported by server; check headers or API docs.
Detected memory leak; process memory usage grows continuously leading to crash or slowdown.
Exception raised during object destruction; may leave resources uncleaned.

pattern: (SSL certificate chain invalid|unable to verify certificate chain)
description: Server certificate chain incomplete or invalid; may prevent secure connection.

pattern: (ForeignKeyConstraintViolation|integrity constraint violation|cannot add or update child row)
description: Database foreign key constraint violated; indicates relational integrity issue.
Enum field contains invalid value; check allowed constants or mapping.

pattern: (Deadlock detected in async task|Task never completed due to cycle|Async deadlock)
description: Deadlock between async tasks or promises; execution halted until timeout or manual intervention.

pattern: (Thread starvation detected|Thread pool exhausted|No available thread)
description: Threads unable to run due to pool exhaustion; may block processing indefinitely.
TCP connection refused by remote host; may indicate service down, firewall, or incorrect port.

pattern: (504 Gateway Timeout|upstream timeout|server did not respond in time)
description: Server gateway timeout; backend service did not respond within time limit.

pattern: (Serialization failure|could not serialize access due to concurrent update)
description: Database transaction serialization failure due to concurrent modification; retry recommended.
Process attempted invalid memory access; may crash or corrupt data.

pattern: (invalid chunked encoding|unexpected end of stream|chunked body parse failed)
description: Failed to parse HTTP chunked transfer; may be truncated response or protocol error.
TLS downgrade attack suspected; server/client negotiated insecure protocol version.

pattern: (DOM-based XSS detected|script injection in DOM|unsafe innerHTML)
description: Potential XSS via DOM injection detected; user input not sanitized before DOM insertion.
Potential HTTP header injection; could allow response splitting or request smuggling.
Database connection pool exhausted; no more connections available for queries.

pattern: (Maximum call stack size exceeded|recursive async loop)
description: Infinite recursion in async or coroutine chain; stack overflow imminent.
API or service rate limit exceeded; queued requests delayed or rejected.

pattern: (Too many open files|EMFILE|file descriptor limit exceeded)
description: OS file descriptor limit reached; I/O operations may fail or crash process.
Deadlock detected via mutex/lock cycle; threads or async tasks blocked indefinitely.

pattern: (Deadlock detected in async iterator|Async generator blocked indefinitely)
description: Async iterator blocked due to circular dependency or unawaited coroutine; execution halted.
Attempted to insert/update duplicate value in unique field; violates DB integrity.

pattern: (HTTP/2 stream error|RST_STREAM received|stream closed with error)
description: HTTP/2 stream failed; may indicate protocol error, server misbehavior, or network interruption.
TLS handshake did not complete within expected timeframe; possible network latency or server issue.

pattern: (GC pause too long|Stop-the-world GC detected|long garbage collection)
description: Long garbage collection pause detected; may impact latency-sensitive operations.
Proxy rejected connection due to failed authentication; check credentials.
SSL certificate expired; secure connection cannot be established.
Nested promise rejected without handler; may terminate Node.js process in future versions.
Complex SQL syntax error; may involve nested queries, CTEs, or function calls.

pattern: (Possible memory leak detected|object cycle not collected|heap growth without free)
description: Memory leak due to cyclic references not collected by GC; may cause process crash.
Process lacks permission to read/write file or directory.
Error decompressing HTTP/2 headers; may indicate malformed response or implementation bug.
Too many listeners attached to async event emitter; may cause memory leaks.
Process received fatal signal; invalid memory access or illegal CPU instruction.

pattern: (Deadlock detected in nested transaction|transaction lock wait timeout)
description: Nested database transactions caused multi-level deadlock; manual intervention or retry needed.

pattern: (Async task timed out|Promise never resolved|Coroutine timeout)
description: Async chain task exceeded allowed execution time; may indicate blocked event loop or resource contention.

pattern: (Replication lag exceeds threshold|Slave not caught up|Stale data detected)
description: Database replication lag detected; reads may return stale data.

pattern: (QUIC transport error|HTTP/3 frame error|stream closed prematurely)
description: HTTP/3 transport layer error; stream aborted or protocol violation detected.

pattern: (Exception in finalizer|Error during object finalization|__del__ exception)
description: Exception raised during garbage collection finalization; resources may remain unfreed.
Stack overflow from deep or infinite recursion; may cause segmentation fault.

pattern: (DOM XSS detected|Unsafe eval or innerHTML chain)
description: Multi-stage DOM XSS injection detected; user input reaches DOM via chained assignments or eval.

common_causes: multiple DOM assignments with user input

pattern: (CSRF token missing in multi-step form|invalid CSRF token detected)
description: Multi-step form request rejected due to missing or invalid CSRF token; security risk if bypassed.
TLS renegotiation failed; may indicate server misconfiguration or MITM attempt.
Enum value mismatch between client and server/library version; may break logic.

pattern: (File name too long|ENAMETOOLONG|path exceeds maximum length)
description: Filesystem path exceeds OS max length; operation fails.
HTTP redirect loop detected; request did not reach final destination.

pattern: (Task was cancelled but resources not freed|Unhandled cancellation exception|leaked async handle)
description: Async task cancelled but resources not cleaned; may cause memory leak or deadlock.
Phantom read occurred in transaction; data read multiple times yields different rows.

pattern: (TLS fallback detected|Insecure protocol negotiated|SSL version downgraded)
description: TLS downgraded to insecure version; may indicate MITM attack or server misconfiguration.

pattern: (Object resurrected during finalization|__del__ resurrected|GC object still referenced)
description: Object resurrected during garbage collection; may prevent memory reclamation and cause leaks.

pattern: (HTTP/3 frame error|QUIC malformed frame|Stream aborted due to frame error)
description: Malformed HTTP/3 frame received; may indicate protocol bug, proxy corruption, or MITM.

pattern: (JWT signature verification failed|Invalid JWT signature|Token tampered)
description: JWT token signature invalid; authentication or authorization may be compromised.

pattern: (OAuth2 refresh token expired|Invalid refresh token|Unable to refresh access token)
description: OAuth2 refresh token invalid or expired; re-authentication required.

pattern: (Circular import detected|Module dependency cycle|ImportError due to cycle)
description: Circular dependency detected between modules; may cause import errors or runtime crash.

pattern: (Write skew detected|Serializable anomaly detected|Concurrent update conflict)
description: Database write skew anomaly detected; transaction updates violate serializability.

pattern: (Maximum call stack size exceeded|Recursive call chain overflow|Infinite recursion detected)
description: Stack overflow caused by deeply nested or infinite recursion; may crash process.

pattern: (SQL injection detected|Nested query manipulation|Potential SQLi payload)
description: Nested SQL injection attempt detected; input contains malicious payload targeting query chain.

pattern: (Kernel panic - not syncing|Double fault|Nested panic detected)
description: Kernel panic triggered by nested fault; system unstable and requires reboot.

common_causes: null pointer dereference in kernel module

pattern: (Thread pool starvation detected|Async tasks pending indefinitely|Deadlocked futures)
description: Thread pool exhausted and async tasks cannot progress; potential process hang.

pattern: (Quorum not reached|Replica nodes unavailable|Distributed transaction failed)
description: Distributed DB failed to reach quorum; write/read operation may be lost or inconsistent.

pattern: (Too many redirects|Redirect storm detected|Infinite HTTP redirect chain)
description: HTTP redirect loop exceeded threshold; request never resolves.

pattern: (Heap fragmentation detected|Unable to allocate contiguous memory|Memory pool exhausted)
description: Severe memory fragmentation; allocation requests fail or crash process.

pattern: (Content Security Policy violation|Multiple CSP directives violated)
description: Multiple CSP violations detected in page; security policy enforcement triggered.

pattern: (JWT token replay detected|Duplicate token usage|Token reuse not allowed)
description: JWT token reused maliciously; possible replay attack.

pattern: (Maximum call stack size exceeded|Mutual recursion detected|Stack overflow chained functions)
description: Mutual recursion between functions caused stack overflow; process may crash.

common_causes: function A calls B and B calls A repeatedly

pattern: (SQL injection nested query detected|Chained SQLi payload|Dynamic subquery manipulation)
description: Chained nested SQL injection detected; input crafted to exploit multi-layer query logic.

pattern: (OAuth2 multi-step authorization failed|Invalid intermediate token|Authorization code reuse)
description: OAuth2 multi-step flow failed; intermediate token invalid or expired.

pattern: (Stack corruption detected|Kernel stack overflow|Invalid stack pointer)
description: Kernel-level stack corruption detected; process or system may crash immediately.

pattern: (Unhandled async task exception cascade|Pending tasks blocked indefinitely|Promise chain rejected without catch)
description: Multiple async tasks failed without handler; may cause process crash or deadlock.

pattern: (Foreign key constraint fails|Cascading FK violation|Referential integrity error)
description: Cascading foreign key violation; multiple tables affected due to dependent delete/update.

pattern: (HTTP/3 frame storm detected|QUIC frame buffer overflow|Stream aborted multiple times)
description: High-frequency malformed HTTP/3 frames detected; connection may reset repeatedly.

pattern: (Stop-the-world GC spike|Long GC pause|Heap collection delay)
description: GC stop-the-world pause exceeds threshold; may impact latency-sensitive operations.

pattern: (DOM XSS multi-stage detected|Unsafe input propagated across multiple nodes)
description: User input traversed multiple stages to DOM unsanitized; potential remote code execution in browser.

common_causes: script injection in multiple DOM nodes

pattern: (JWT token replay detected|Duplicate JWT usage|Replay attack suspected)
description: Detected repeated usage of JWT token; possible replay attack.

pattern: (OAuth2 chained refresh token failed|Intermediate token expired|Authorization code reused)
description: Chained OAuth2 token refresh failed; multi-step flow interrupted.

pattern: (Circular import tree detected|Module dependency cycle found|ImportError chain)
description: Circular import in multi-module dependency tree; may cause runtime failure or stack overflow.

pattern: (Enum/Flag mismatch detected|Unsupported enum combination|Versioned enum inconsistency)
description: Enum or flag mismatch across multiple layers; may break logic in chained calls.

pattern: (Nested SQL injection detected|Multi-layer SQLi payload|Chained query manipulation)
description: Nested SQLi across multiple queries detected; high risk for DB compromise.
